effects.description: Freya attacks with chains, dealing Attack ×200%–280% damage to target and surrounding enemies, marking the target. When marked target is attacked, 40%–80% of the damage is dealt to its surrounding enemies (cooldown 0.5s).
Freya chain-smashes and binds a target, dealing Attack ×100%–140% damage and immobilizing them for 1.5 s. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}
Freya’s condition periodically erupts: after 8 → 7 → 6 → 5 → 4 normal attacks, Crit Rate increases by 60%–100%. :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}
Freya throws a smoke grenade, reducing all enemy troops’ Attack by 4%–20%. :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}
After normal attack, Freya has 50% chance to perform Reap, dealing Attack ×(20%–100%) extra damage. :contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5}

effects.effect-name: Friendly Infantry & Marksman Damage + / Damage Taken −
effects.description: Decreases damage taken by and increases damage dealt of friendly Infantry and Marksman by 3%–15%. :contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}

exploration.ability: Night’s Raid (Lv.5): Freya’s rigorous training increases her damage by 30% while her instincts reflexively deal Attack ×300% damage to enemies’ summons. :contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7}
exploration.name: Night’s Raid

expedition.ability: Defender of the Watch (Lv.5): Freya’s vigilance increases Defender Troops’ Defense by 15%. :contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8}
expedition.name: Defender of the Watch
